name.description: Identifier for the area which may be used in code.

hideOtherAreas.description: Whether everything outside of this area should be hidden when loading a scene within this area.

fillGaps.description: Whether to fill gaps in the ground. Can only be disabled if hideOtherAreas is true.

areas.description: A list of other areas to include in this area.

regions.description: A list of region IDs to include in the area.

regionBoxes.description: A list of region boxes to include in the area. Each box is an array of the bottom left & top right region IDs.

aabbs.description: An array of bounding boxes, region IDs and/or area names specifying which areas the override should be limited to.

unhideAreas.description: An array of bounding boxes, region IDs and/or area names which should be included in the area, but not used to determine whether the player is within the area for area hiding. Intended for use with unfinished map portions. Any overlap with main areas is ignored.
